data.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
data.text:
Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (8-Jun-1999)

Director: Jay Roach

Writers: Michael McCullers; Mike Myers

Music: George S. Clinton

Producers: John Lyons; Eric McLeod; Demi Moore; Mike Myers; Jennifer Todd; Suzanne Todd

Keywords: Comedy, Espionage, Spoof, Starbucks, Time Travel

Austin Powers' bride turns out to be a fembot assassin; Dr. Evil time travels back to 1969 with the goal of stealing Austin's mojo, which is extracted from his frozen body by Fat Bastard; Austin follows in the British Ministry of Defence's time machine to recover the purloined mojo and save the world or something. Also introduced: Dr. Evil's clone, Mini Me. First sequel to Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery (1997). Received an Oscar nomination for Best Makeup.
